name: Rusteroids
description:
Rusteroids

----------

Rusteroids is a free open source game which I made in order to teach myself Rust programming. The repository is available from:

https://github.com/filtoid/rusteroids

There is an accompanying video series avaialble at:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFOS-Gn3aXROnSfl26esPExssd-rQw6jD

I hope you enjoy what we have so far, more will come in the future as the project proceeds, if you have any problems please feel free to raise an issue against the

Github repository mentioned above. 

All the best,

Filtoid
